[[1914]] - [[20 March|March 20]]: she did the second Swedish translation of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Hobbit]]'' (''Bilbo - En hobbits äventyr'' ["Bilbo: An Hobbit's Adventures"]; illustrated by [[Tove Jansson]]).
she translated Tolkien's ''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]'' (''Sagan om Smeden och stjärnan'' ["The Tale of the Smith and the Star"]).
